xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 11 Ācayagāmittika » 11.7 Pañhāvāra » 11.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 11.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Ācayagāmittika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
68.
1631Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare cha, samanantare cha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā cha, vigate cha, avigate terasa.
1632Anulomaṃ.
<< 11.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
